revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: An introduction to merchandize : containing: A compleat system of arithmetic : A system of Algebra : Book-keeping in various forms : An account of the trade of Gr..."
revision.text: Possibly: An introduction to merchandize : containing: A compleat system of arithmetic : A system of Algebra : Book-keeping in various forms : An account of the trade of Great Britain, and the laws and practices which merchants are chiefly interested in : in two volumes ... / by Robert Hamilton, LL.D. Master of the Academy, Perth. 2v. (Edinburgh : Printed for the author; sold by T. Cadell, London, and John Balfour, Edinburgh, M,DCC,LXXVII [1777-1779]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1875992~S1
